an3.9:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an3.9:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an3.9:2.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an3.9:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati”ti.
